scripts.build-aar: react-native bundle --platform android --dev false --entry-file index.js --bundle-output android/app/src/main/assets/index.android.bundle --assets-dest android/app/build/intermediates/res/merged/release/ && rmdir android/app/src/main/res/drawable-* && rmdir android/app/src/main/res/raw/* && cd android && ./gradlew assembleRelease && cd .. && open android/app/build/outputs/aar
